description: Runners High is an album released by the Pillows on January 22, 1999. It was the last album to feature guest bassist, Tatsuya Kashima. Several songs from the record were later featured in the anime OVA series FLCL by Gainax.

img.alt: Cover of the Album 'Runners High' from the Pillows
img.title: Cover of the Album 'Runners High' from the Pillows

description: Demon Days is the second studio album by British virtual band Gorillaz. It was first released on 11 May 2005 in Japan and on 23 May 2005 in the United Kingdom by Parlophone and in the United States by Virgin Records.

img.alt: Cover of the Album 'Demon Days' from the Gorillaz
img.title: Cover of the Album 'Demon Days' from the Gorillaz

description: Nectar is the second studio album by Japanese singer-songwriter Joji, released on 25 September 2020 via 88rising.

description: A young girl finds and befriends a humanoid robot and descends with him into the titular Abyss in search of her mother.
